article: Many people like to  search  the Internet. Exploring the Internet is one of the most important activities of the day. The Internet brings the outside world closer to people's  _  . Some people say the world is smaller than before  because  of the Internet. What's  is going on  in other countries?  _  do people live in places far away? Is there an  _  sports game somewhere?  What is  life like in the deepest part of sea? If you want to answer all these questions, just come to the Internet.  Of course  people can also learn through reading or listening to the radio. But with the Internet they can learn better and  more easily  . A lot of information can  be collected  at a great speed. Can we go shopping without leaving home? Can we see a doctor without going to the school? Can we see a  _  without going to the hospital? --All these things seemed impossible but now they have become quite  _  . The Internet helps us open our eyes. It also helps us  _  our minds. The Internet often gives us new ideas.  In a word  , it helps us in many ways. Great changes have taken place  because of  the use of the Internet.
